forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
